title: Nap Cats Watch Face
summary: Every moment is good for a nap. Do not miss any with this Android Wear watchface!
description: =(^.^)=Every moment is good for a nap. Don't miss any with this analog watch face!7 sleepy cats for 7 days of week. Enjoy this colorful analog watch with lazy-cats doodles by the illustrator Saratelka https://www.facebook.com/saratelkaPress:"It has pastail colored lazy cat doodles fur every day of the week, with hours labeled as naps, some in catslock" - Android Policehttp://www.androidpolice.com/2015/02/10/cattitude-nap-cats-watch-face-always-napoclock/Designed for Android Wear.Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/106084399129186124597/106084399129186124597/posts
descriptionHTML:
=(^.^)=

Every moment is good for a nap. Don't miss any with this analog watch face!

7 sleepy cats for 7 days of week. Enjoy this colorful analog watch with lazy-cats doodles by the illustrator Saratelka https://www.facebook.com/saratelka

Press:
"It has pastail colored lazy cat doodles fur every day of the week, with hours labeled as naps, some in catslock" - Android Police
http://www.androidpolice.com/2015/02/10/cattitude-nap-cats-watch-face-always-napoclock/

Designed for Android Wear.
Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.

ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+
https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/106084399129186124597/106084399129186124597/posts
comments: I am absolutely in love with this app as my watchface. the only things I would want more would be an option to have a square layout for the text/numbers, and the option to set it to keep a single color rather than change every day. but! this is still an adorable watch face nonetheless, and I appreciate it greatly!
Widget only 1x1 Purchased this to use on my phone as a widget, but won't resize beyond 1x1. Please fix and will adjust review!

Funny cats and creative I wish I could customize some settings. I would like to disable the black ambient mode.  I use the moto 360.  In fact the main reason I bought the watch face was to get away from all these dark watch faces.
Perfect Adorable, simple and soothing. Now I need some warm milk
Love it! A but simple for how much it costs, but it's still awesome!
